description.narrative: The main objectives of the DTIS update 2019-2023 are to: 1) take stock of implementation of current CTIS, Trade SWAp Roadmap and MTP, 2) develop a new approach and tool to mobilize resources for Cambodia’s trade development and 3) identify and update priorities areas for intervention so as to ensure that the new CTIS and Trade SWAp Roadmap 2019-2023 findings and recommendations contribute to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) Agenda and particularly feed into the new National Strategic Development Plan (NSDP) for the next Royal Government of Cambodia term (2019-2023).

participating-org.narrative: Royal Government of Cambodia (Ministry of Commerce)

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
